Package arb.stochastic

Interface CharacteristicFunction<P extends DensityFunction>

Type Parameters:
P - the type of DensityFunction this characteristic function corresponds to
All Superinterfaces:
Function<Real,Real>, RealFunction
All Known Implementing Classes:
GaussianCharacteristicFunction, UnitCenteredGaussianCharacteristicFunction
public interface CharacteristicFunction<P extends DensityFunction> extends RealFunction
The characteristic function of any real-valued random variable completely defines its probability distribution.
If a random variable admits a DensityFunction function, then the CharacteristicFunction is its FourierTransform
If the density function is symmetric about the origin then the corresponding Fourier transform will have only real-values for real arguments otherwise in general it can and will be complex-valued
